name: RelaxedJsonParser
description: A JSON parser which accepts laxly-formatted JSON input (using PEG.js)

scripts.pretest: [ ! -e lib/PegjsJsonParser.js -o src/PegjsJsonParser.pegjs -nt lib/PegjsJsonParser.js ] && ./node_modules/.bin/pegjs --track-line-and-column src/PegjsJsonParser.pegjs lib/PegjsJsonParser.js || true

author: Daniel
